feed.title: Activepieces Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Activepieces: 0.36.1
entry.content:
‚ú® Exciting New Features

  • feat(audit-logs): filter by user / project / action (#6058) @abuaboud

üß© Pieces

  • chore(claude): bump piece version (#6067) @kishanprmr
  • feat(apify): get actors ,get database items and get last run actions (#6059) @buttonsbond
  • feat(smtp): add support for multiple attachments in SMTP Piece (#6025) @janwytze
  • fix(subflows): testing flow experience (#6057) @abuaboud

üêû Bug Fixes

  • fix: apply migration before importing (#6071) @abuaboud
  • fix: dragging step while the left side bar was open + stop deleting step when dragged under itself (#6060) @AbdulTheActivePiecer

üé® Enhancements & Polish

  • chore(Human-Input): make it possible to drop/paste images in input + make text input resizable on new lines. (#6062) @AbdulTheActivePiecer

Thanks ‚ù§Ô∏è

@AbdulTheActivePiecer, @abuaboud, @buttonsbond, @janwytze and @kishanprmr

entry.title: New release for Activepieces: 0.36.2
entry.content:
üß© Pieces

  • fix: disable connect button until all oauth2 props are filled + use correct zoho api urls (#6100) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • feat(file-helper): added an action to convert the encoding (#6098) @Seb-C
  • feat(google-sheets): add replace rows and check for duplication rows options (#6085) @kishanprmr
  • feat(azure-communication-services): send email (#6084) @matthieu-lombard
  • feat(instasent): add or update contact, delete contact and create event action (#6064) @dev-instasent
  • fix(qdrant): fix embedding ids field parsing error (#6078) @kishanprmr
  • feat(apify): start actor action (#6072) @buttonsbond
  • feat(sftp): add generic sftp actions (#6068) @janwytze

üõ†Ô∏è Piece Framework

  • refactor: deprecate validators & introduce zod (#6086) @abuaboud

üêû Bug Fixes

  • fix(pieces): revert validation in the piece (#6092) @abuaboud
  • fix(embed): stop task override when it is undefined in jwt (#6088) @abuaboud
  • fix: select first invalid step in the flow when you enter a flow and scroll to it if it is invisible (#6076) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • fix: add error message extractor from trigger failed test (#5982) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • fix: only exclude dot and slash in project names (#6082) @abuaboud
  • fix: stop refreshing step settings editing a published version (#6077) @AbdulTheActivePiecer

üìö Documentation

  • docs: add matthieu-lombard as a contributor for plugin (#6089) @allcontributors
  • docs: add dev-instasent as a contributor for plugin (#6087) @allcontributors
  • docs: add mordonez as a contributor for plugin (#6081) @allcontributors

üßπ Maintenance & Dev Experience

  • chore: upgrade bullmq (#6102) @abuaboud
  • fix: remove public schema reference from migration files (#6099) @jasonfill
  • chore: all new pieces update apply to version 0.30.0 and above (#6093) @abuaboud
  • refactor: deprecate validators & introduce zod (#6086) @abuaboud
  • refactor: props resolver (#6075) @abuaboud

Thanks ‚ù§Ô∏è

@AbdulTheActivePiecer, @Seb-C, @abuaboud, @allcontributors, @allcontributors[bot], @buttonsbond, @dev-instasent, @janwytze, @jasonfill, @kishanprmr and @matthieu-lombard

entry.title: New release for Activepieces: 0.36.3
entry.content:
üß© Pieces

  • fix(google-sheets): fix duplicates option error (#6108) @kishanprmr
  • fix(utility-ai): add raw message for data extraction error (#6109) @kishanprmr
  • feat(gmail): allow custom from address (#6107) @AdamSelene

üêû Bug Fixes

  • fix: smtp port (#6112) @abuaboud
  • fix: remove invalid key error in the engine and handle null key (#6111) @abuaboud
  • fix: prevent websocket error to crash, optimize log deletion (#6110) @abuaboud
  • fix(engine): handle empty value in store (#6106) @abuaboud
  • fix: allow empty response in pause (#6105) @abuaboud
  • fix: prevent false matches in piece directory detection (#6097) @dev-instasent

Thanks ‚ù§Ô∏è

@AdamSelene, @abuaboud, @dev-instasent and @kishanprmr

entry.title: New release for Activepieces: 0.36.4
entry.content:
üêû Bug Fixes

  • fix: delete s3 object when file is deleted (#6117) @abuaboud
  • fix: index trigger events & runs to speed up delete (#6116) @abuaboud
  • fix: simplify delete stale data logic (#6115) @abuaboud

Thanks ‚ù§Ô∏è

@abuaboud

entry.title: New release for Activepieces: 0.37.0
entry.content:
‚ú® Exciting New Features

  • feat(rbac): support custom project role management (#6066) @hazemadelkhalel
  • feat: speed up workers with signed urls & enable live updates (#6142) @abuaboud
  • fix: speed up local piece development (#6136) @abuaboud
  • feat: Flow Execution & Workers observability (#6114) @OsamaHaikal

üß© Pieces

  • fix(google-sheets): duplicate & overwrite (#6132) @abuaboud
  • fix(google-drive): files could not be moved (#6140) @AdamSelene
  • fix(file-helper): fix change encoding (#6131) @abuaboud
  • fix(file-helper): change file encoding (#6130) @abuaboud
  • feat(google-drive): add option to support all drives when moving a file (#6128) @AdamSelene

üõ†Ô∏è Piece Framework

  • fix: add object validation processor (#6159) @hazemadelkhalel

üêû Bug Fixes

  • fix(sampledata): fix sample data attachment response (#6160) @hazemadelkhalel
  • fix: allowing json as query params on http piece (#6146) @beyondlevi
  • fix: add object validation processor (#6159) @hazemadelkhalel
  • fix: rename project roles and fix import flow dialog styling (#6153) @hazemadelkhalel
  • fix(ui): read permissions from the server (#6148) @abuaboud
  • fix: infinite loading for testing steps or flows (#6138) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • fix: stop "Catch Webhook" from being invalid by default (#6124) @AbdulTheActivePiecer

üé® Enhancements & Polish

  • chore: update translations (#6164) @abuaboud
  • fix: allow code editor to expand vertically with its content + show logs for code piece runs (#6144) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • feat(form): fill the form with data from query params (#6154) @hazemadelkhalel
  • feat(rbac): allow to update project role in teams page (#6145) @hazemadelkhalel
  • feat: optimize step files uploading by relying on signed urls (#6129) @abuaboud
  • feat: add active flows and activated users columns to projects table in admin platform (#6123) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • feat(import-flow): add folder selection to import flow dialog (#6120) @hazemadelkhalel
  • feat: reorder sidebar items in platform (#6121) @abuaboud

üìö Documentation

  • docs: add beyondlevi as a contributor for plugin (#6151) @allcontributors

üßπ Maintenance & Dev Experience

  • chore: automate trial onboarding (#6163) @abuaboud
  • security: upgrade axios from 1.7.7 to 1.7.8 (#6147) @abuaboud
  • refactor: sidebar folders (#6122) @abuaboud

Thanks ‚ù§Ô∏è

@AbdulTheActivePiecer, @AdamSelene, @OsamaHaikal, @abuaboud, @allcontributors, @allcontributors[bot], @beyondlevi, @hazemadelkhalel, @kishanprmr, @levinobregab and @snyk-bot
